trans-unit.source: Install or update a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] deployment on a computer.
trans-unit.target: Instalar ou atualizar um [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] implementação num computador.

trans-unit.source: You can use InPlaceHostingManager to write programs that install [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] applications programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar InPlaceHostingManager para programas de escrita que instalarem [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] aplicações através de programação.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use this class in a controlled system management software (SMS) environment or in situations where you need a complex installation that performs a number of pre-installation or post-installation operations on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode utilizar esta classe num ambiente de software (SMS) gestão controladas do sistema ou em situações em que precisa de uma instalação complexa que executa um número de operações de pré-instalação ou pós-instalação no computador local.

trans-unit.source: Generally, you will want to use the members of this class in a specific order: 1.
trans-unit.target: Geralmente, irá querer utilizar os membros desta classe por uma ordem específica: 1.

trans-unit.source: Create a new instance of InPlaceHostingManager.
trans-unit.target: Crie uma nova instância do InPlaceHostingManager.

trans-unit.source: Download the deployment manifest by using <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Transferir o manifesto de implementação utilizando <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A>.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: Check that the application can be run with the appropriate permissions by using <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Verifique que a aplicação pode ser executada com as permissões adequadas utilizando <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A>.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A>

trans-unit.source: Download and install the application by using <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Transferir e instalar a aplicação utilizando <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationAsync%2A>.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If you call any of these parameters out of order, they will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: -Se tem de chamar qualquer um destes parâmetros fora de ordem, estes irão gerar uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: InPlaceHostingManager can install a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application, but cannot execute it.
trans-unit.target: Pode instalar InPlaceHostingManager um [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] aplicação, mas não é possível executá-lo.

trans-unit.source: Some methods in this class, such as <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.Execute%2A>, are reserved for use when downloading a Windows Presentation Foundation-based application that runs inside a Web browser.
trans-unit.target: Alguns métodos de classe, tal como <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.Execute%2A>, estão reservados para utilização quando transferir uma aplicação baseada no Windows Presentation Foundation, que é executado dentro de um Web browser.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.Execute%2A>

trans-unit.source: To use InPlaceHostingManager to download and install applications, you must make sure that the certificate for signing the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] applications you plan to install is already installed on client computers as a trusted publisher.
trans-unit.target: Para utilizar InPlaceHostingManager para transferir e instalar aplicações, tem de se certificar que o certificado de assinatura de [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] aplicações planeia instalar já está instalado nos computadores cliente como um fabricante fidedigno.

trans-unit.source: For more information on trusted publishers, see [Trusted Application Deployment Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre fabricantes fidedignos, consulte [descrição geral de implementação de aplicação fidedigno](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > There is currently a product limitation that prevents InPlaceHostingManager from working correctly when you debug your code using [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Atualmente é uma limitação de produto que impede a funcionar corretamente quando depurar a sua utilização de código InPlaceHostingManager [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: If you debug your application in [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] by using the F5 key, the sample will throw mysterious exceptions when you call <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se a depurar a aplicação no [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] utilizando a tecla F5, o exemplo irá gerar exceções mysterious quando chamar <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationAsync%2A>.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: To debug using [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)], start the application without debugging, and then attach the debugger.
trans-unit.target: Para depurar utilizando [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)], inicie a aplicação sem a depuração e, em seguida, anexe o depurador.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use another debugger, such as WinDbg.
trans-unit.target: Em alternativa, pode utilizar o depurador outro, como o WinDbg.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager"></xref> to download and install the specified browser-hosted application.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager"> </xref> para transferir e instalar a aplicação especificada alojada no browser.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is used when you want to download a Windows Presentation Foundation-based application that is hosted in a Web browser.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor é utilizado quando pretender transferir uma aplicação baseada no Windows Presentation Foundation que está alojada num Web browser.

trans-unit.source: To download Windows Forms-based applications that are deployed using [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)], use the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.%23ctor%2A> constructor with the `launchInHostProcess` parameter set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Para transferir aplicações baseada em formulários do Windows que são implementadas através de [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)], utilize o <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.%23ctor%2A>construtor com o `launchInHostProcess` parâmetro definido como `false`.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A Uniform Resource Identifier (<xref:System.Uri>) to a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application's deployment manifest.
trans-unit.target: Um Uniform Resource Identifier (<xref:System.Uri>) para um [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] o manifesto de implementação da aplicação.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager"></xref> can be used only in Windows XP or in later versions of the Windows operating system.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager"></xref>pode ser utilizado apenas no Windows XP ou versões posteriores do sistema operativo Windows.

trans-unit.source: Cannot pass for the deploymentManifest argument.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível transmitir para o deploymentManifest argumento.

trans-unit.source: deploymentManifest uses a URI scheme that is not supported by [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: deploymentManifestutiliza um esquema URI não é suportado pelo [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager"></xref> to download and install the specified application, which can be either a stand-alone Windows Forms-based application or an application hosted in a Web browser.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager"> </xref> para transferir e instalar a aplicação especificada, o que pode ser uma aplicação baseada em formulários do Windows autónoma ou uma aplicação alojada num Web browser.

trans-unit.source: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) to the deployment manifest of the application that will be installed.
trans-unit.target: O Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) para o manifesto de implementação da aplicação que será instalado.

trans-unit.source: Whether this application will be run in a host, such as a Web browser.
trans-unit.target: Indica se esta aplicação será executada no anfitrião, como um Web browser.

trans-unit.source: For a stand-alone application, set this value to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Para uma aplicação autónoma, definir este valor como <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager"></xref> can be used only in Windows XP or in later versions of the Windows operating system.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager"></xref>pode ser utilizado apenas no Windows XP ou versões posteriores do sistema operativo Windows.

trans-unit.source: Cannot pass for the deploymentManifest argument.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível transmitir para o deploymentManifest argumento.

trans-unit.source: deploymentManifest uses a URI scheme that is not supported by [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: deploymentManifestutiliza um esquema URI não é suportado pelo [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application has the appropriate permissions and platform dependencies to run on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] detém as dependências de plataforma e as permissões adequadas para executar no computador local.

trans-unit.source: You must call AssertApplicationRequirements after <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A> returns successfully.
trans-unit.target: Tem de chamar AssertApplicationRequirements após <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A>devolve com êxito.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must not call <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationAsync%2A> unless you call AssertApplicationRequirements, and it returns without error.
trans-unit.target: Não tem de chamar <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationAsync%2A>, exceto se chamar AssertApplicationRequirements e devolve sem erros.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raised if this method is called before the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync*> method.
trans-unit.target: É desencadeado se este método é denominado antes do <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync*>método.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync*>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application has the appropriate permissions and platform dependencies to run on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] detém as dependências de plataforma e as permissões adequadas para executar no computador local.

trans-unit.source: If `grantApplicationTrust` is `true`, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> will grant the application elevated permissions if it requires them.
trans-unit.target: Se `grantApplicationTrust` é `true`, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>irá conceder a aplicação elevados permissões se é necessário-los.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>

trans-unit.source: This is only possible if <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> is able to grant those permissions.
trans-unit.target: Isto só é possível se <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>é capaz de conceder essas permissões.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application is being installed as part of a larger package and the installer has been granted full trust, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> will be able to grant the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application full trust.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se um [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] aplicação está a ser instalada como parte de um pacote maior e o instalador foi concedido fidedignidade total, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>poderá conceder a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] fidedignidade total da aplicação.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>

trans-unit.source: If `grantApplicationTrust` is `false`, the application will not be granted any permissions.
trans-unit.target: Se `grantApplicationTrust` é `false`, a aplicação não terá as permissões.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the application will attempt to elevate its permissions to the required level.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, a aplicação irá tentar efetuar a elevação as respetivas permissões para o nível necessário.

trans-unit.source: Cancels an asynchronous download operation.
trans-unit.target: Cancela uma operação assíncrona de transferência.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Versões de todos os recursos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>.
trans-unit.target: É possível chamar Dispose quando tiver terminado de utilizando <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: O método de Dispose deixa o <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>num Estado não utilizável.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar Dispose, tem de libertar todas as referências para o <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>para que o recoletor de lixo pode reclame a memória que a <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>foi occupying.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [recursos não geridos limpeza](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [implementar um método eliminar](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Sempre chamada eliminar antes de libertar a última referência <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos que está a utilizar não irão ser libertados até que as chamadas de recoletor de lixo a <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>do objeto `Finalize` método.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>

trans-unit.source: Downloads an application update in the background.
trans-unit.target: Transfere uma atualização da aplicação em segundo plano.

trans-unit.source: You must call this method after calling <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Tem de chamar este método depois de chamar <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A>.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raised if this method is called before the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync*> and <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements*> methods.
trans-unit.target: É desencadeado se este método é denominado antes do <> </> *> e <> </> *> métodos.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the application has finished downloading to the local computer.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a aplicação foi concluída a transferência para o computador local.

trans-unit.source: If you are installing a Windows Forms-based application, you will need to instruct users to launch the application themselves; you cannot start Windows Forms-based applications programmatically by using the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.Execute%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se estiver a instalar uma aplicação baseada em formulários do Windows, terá de instruir os utilizadores a iniciar a aplicação próprios; Não é possível iniciar as aplicações baseadas no Windows Forms através de programação utilizando o <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.Execute%2A>método.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.Execute%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when there is a change in the status of an application or manifest download.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando existe uma alteração do Estado de uma transferência de aplicação ou manifesto.

trans-unit.source: In a console application, events are assigned to threads from a thread pool.
trans-unit.target: Numa aplicação de consola, eventos são atribuídos para threads de um conjunto de threads.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you might receive progress update events out of order, with a subsequent event showing a decrease compared with a previous event.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, poderá receber progresso atualização eventos fora de ordem, com um evento subsequente que mostra um decréscimo comparado com um evento anterior.

trans-unit.source: You will not see such behavior in a Windows Forms-based application, because events in Windows Forms are processed sequentially out of the user interface (UI) thread's message queue.
trans-unit.target: Não verá esse comportamento numa aplicação baseada em formulários do Windows, porque os eventos no Windows Forms são processados sequencialmente fora da fila de mensagens do thread de interface (IU) do utilizador.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Launches the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application, if and only if it is a Windows Presentation Foundation-based application running in a Web browser.
trans-unit.target: Inicia o [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] aplicação, se, e apenas se, é uma aplicação baseada no Windows Presentation Foundation em execução num browser.

trans-unit.source: This method is valid only for Windows Presentation Foundation-based applications that can be hosted in a Web browser (that is, their deployment manifests define the `hostInBrowser` XML element).
trans-unit.target: Este método só é válido para aplicações baseadas no Windows Presentation Foundation que podem ser alojadas num Web browser (ou seja, definem os manifestos de implementação de `hostInBrowser` elemento XML).

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjectHandle"></xref> corresponding to the launched application.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjectHandle"> </xref> correspondente à aplicação iniciada.

trans-unit.source: Downloads the deployment manifest of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application in the background, and raises an event when the operation has either completed or encountered an error.
trans-unit.target: Transfere o manifesto de implementação do [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] aplicação em segundo plano e gera um evento quando a operação foi concluída ou encontrou um erro.

trans-unit.source: To receive notification of when this event completes, create an event handler for the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: Para receber notificações de quando este evento é concluída, crie um processador de eventos para o <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestCompleted>eventos.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestCompleted>

trans-unit.source: If this event is called, and no error is indicated by <xref:System.Deployment.Application.GetManifestCompletedEventArgs>, you should next call <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A> to verify that the application will have permission to run on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: Se este evento é chamado e nenhum erro é indicado pelo <xref:System.Deployment.Application.GetManifestCompletedEventArgs>, em seguida deve chamar <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A>para verificar que a aplicação terá permissão para ser executada no computador local.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.GetManifestCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the deployment manifest has been downloaded to the local computer.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o manifesto de implementação tenha sido transferido para o computador local.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> property of <xref:System.Deployment.Application.GetManifestCompletedEventArgs> to check whether <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A> completed successfully or returned an error.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Deployment.Application.GetManifestCompletedEventArgs>para verificar se <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A>foi concluída com êxito ou devolveu um erro.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.GetManifestCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> is null, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A> completed successfully, and you can call <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>é nulo, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A>foi concluída com êxito, e pode chamar <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A>.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Removes a previously installed user-defined component of an application.
trans-unit.target: Remove um componente instalado anteriormente definido pelo utilizador de uma aplicação.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a subscription identifier, which indicates the add-in to remove.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que contém um identificador de subscrição, o que indica o suplemento para remover.

trans-unit.source: subscriptionId is not a valid subscription identity, or does not include a name, public key token, processor architecture, and version number.
trans-unit.target: subscriptionIdNão é uma identidade de subscrição válido ou não inclui um nome, o token de chave pública, a arquitetura de processador e o número de versão.

trans-unit.source: subscriptionId is .
trans-unit.target: subscriptionIdis .

trans-unit.source: Removes a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application that includes the <customUX> element.
trans-unit.target: Remove um [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] aplicação que inclui o <customUX> elemento.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a subscription identifier, which indicates the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application to remove.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que contém um identificador de subscrição, o que indica o [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] aplicação para remover.
